template.title: Learn the programming pattern for LOB (Line of Business) applications (.NET 5)
template.description: A LOB application is a computer program designed to help a business run. The template installs a WPF client project connecting directly to the "Van Arsdel" SQLite database. The app contains dialogs for selecting orders, and selecting and adding county codes. An in-depth demonstration of using viewmodels and recordsets for rapidly developing LOB software.
